select-details.none-selected: Choose the details you want to update

transport-options.required: Tell us how you will arrive

flight-number.required: Enter the number of the flight you will be arriving in the UK on, for example EK009, QR003 or KU101
flight-number.maxlength: Your flight number is too long. Please check your travel documents and enter it correctly
flight-number.regex: Enter a valid flight number, for example EK009, QR003 or KU101

accept-declaration.required: You must agree to the declaration to continue

departure-date.required: Enter the date you will depart for the UK
departure-date.afterDate: Date of travel in the UK must be no more than 3 months from now
departure-date.beforeDate: Date of travel must be at least 48 hours from now
departure-date.travel-too-soon: Date of travel must be at least 48 hours from now
departure-date.depart-after-arrive: Your departure cannot be after your arrival
departure-date.depart-24-hours-before-arrive: The date your flight to the UK takes off cannot be more than 24 hours before it arrives in the UK

uk-duration.required: Select your length of stay in the UK

uk-departure-travel-number.required: Enter the flight number, train number or boat name that you will be leaving the UK on

uk-date-of-departure.required: Enter the date you are leaving the UK
uk-date-of-departure.beforeDate: The date you leave the UK cannot be in the past
uk-date-of-departure.afterDate: Date of departure cannot be more than 6 months after you enter the UK

uk-port-of-departure.required: Select one of the airports, sea ports or rail terminals from the list

uk-address-1.required: Enter the address of the first place you will stay when you arrive in the UK
uk-address-1.regex: Enter your address in the UK in English

uk-postcode.required: Enter the post code of your UK address
uk-postcode.regex: Enter a UK post code, for example AB12 3CD

train-number.required: Enter the train number you will be entering the UK on. This will be on your travel documents

train-departure-date.required: Enter the date you will be travelling to the UK
train-departure-date.date: Enter a valid date, in the format dd mm yyyy
train-departure-date.afterDate: Date of travel to the UK must be no more than 3 months from now
train-departure-date.beforeDate: Date of travel must be at least 48 hours from now
train-departure-date.travel-too-soon: Date of travel must be at least 48 hours from now
train-departure-date.depart-after-arrive: Your departure cannot be after your arrival
train-departure-date.depart-24-hours-before-arrive: Your departure cannot be more than 24 hours before your arrival

train-departure-time.required: Enter the time your train leaves to come to the UK
train-departure-time.validTime: Enter the time your train leaves to come to the UK

train-departure-country.required: Select the country your train to the UK is travelling from
train-departure-country.equal: Select one of the countries from the list

train-departure-station.required: Enter the name of the port your travel to the UK departs from

train-arrival-station.equal: Select one of the stations from the list

train-arrival-date.required: Enter the date your train arrives in the UK
train-arrival-date.date: Enter a valid date, in the format dd mm yyyy
train-arrival-date.afterDate: Date of arrival in the UK must be no more than 3 months from now
train-arrival-date.beforeDate: Date of arrival must be at least 48 hours from now

train-arrival-time.required: Enter the time your train is due to arrive in the UK
train-arrival-time.validTime: Enter the time your train is due to arrive in the UK in 24 hour format HH:MM
